author: craigmcc
msg: Miscellaneous updates to the Application Developer's Guide to bring it up
to date with respect to Tomcat 3.2.

author: larryi
msg: Port Pierre Delisle's fix for the incredably unhelpful error message that occurs

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove references to "Tomcat 3.3" and "Tomcat 3.4" since that code base is
now a "revolution", not the plan of record.

author: craigmcc
msg: Allow the following sequence to work:
session = request.getSession(true);	// Get a new session
In case this bug looks familiar, I had to fix it in 3.1 also.  Oh well,
at least 4.0 does this right out of the box ...

author: craigmcc
msg: Update pathname parsing to deal with multiple '\' characters on NetWare
